title: ライフラインの活性化
answer:
@startuml
autoactivate on
alice -> bob : hello
bob -> bob : self call
bill -> bob #005500 : hello from thread 2
bob -> george ** : create
return done in thread 2
return rc
bob -> george !! : delete
return success
@enduml

title: ユーザー認証
オンライン注文
answer:
@startuml
        actor Customer
        participant "Order System"
        participant "Payment Gateway"
        Customer -> "Order System" : Place Order
        "Order System" -> "Payment Gateway" : Process Payment
        "Payment Gateway" -> "Order System" : Payment Confirmation
        "Order System" -> Customer : Order Confirmation
        @enduml

title: DBクエリ処理
注文処理のフロー
新規アカウント作成
注文の状態遷移
answer:
@startuml
        [*] --> New
        New --> Processing : Order Placed
        Processing --> Shipped : Ready to Ship
        Shipped --> Delivered : Deliver Order
        Delivered --> [*]
        @enduml

title: ログイン状態
基本的なWebアプリ構成
answer:
@startuml
        node "Web Server"
        node "App Server"
        node "Database Server"
        "Web Server" --> "App Server" : forwards
        "App Server" ..> "Database Server" : uses
        @enduml

title: 分散システム構成
answer:
@startuml
        node "Load Balancer"
        node "App Server 1"
        node "App Server 2"
        node "Database Server"
        "Load Balancer" --> "App Server 1" : directs
        "Load Balancer" --> "App Server 2" : directs
        "App Server 1" ..> "Database Server" : uses
        "App Server 2" ..> "Database Server" : uses
        @enduml

title: プロジェクトスケジュール
タスクと依存関係
answer:
@@startgantt
        Project starts the 2021/01/01
        [Task1] lasts 5 days
        [Task2] lasts 10 days
        [Task2] starts 5 days after [Task1]'s end
        @endgantt

title: 開発計画
answer:
@startmindmap
        * Project
        ** Timeline
        ** Budget
        ** Resources
        *** Human
        *** Material
        ** Risks
        @endmindmap

title: プロジェクトのリスク
answer:
@startmindmap
        * Project
        ** Risks
        *** Technical
        *** Financial
        *** Legal
        *** Operational
        @endmindmap
